title: coincoredev
author: coincoredev
created_time: November 26, 2023, 02:36:34 PMLast edit: November 28, 2023, 11:30:59 AM by coincoredev

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: How can you be a more universal coin than BTC? (When you most likely are creating a fork of BTC in the first place...)Everyone can access the wallet. It is the most traded crypto in the world. Using the name 'Coin' is too generic. It will get lost. You need a real, and unique name, with 4-letter ticker symbol.What do you hope to achieve?

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: You clearly do not understand the thought pattern of people.If no one knows about 'CoinCore' and someone asks them for coin, they will simply think of their currency, or in terms of crypto, Bitcoin.Unless you spend $50,000 to list on high-end exchange and spend the same on marketing, NO ONE will refer to this project when anyone says Coin.You need a new name. Or spell is differently. You need to be unique or it gets lost.
